workshop.title: Cloud Accelerate: Oracle API & Integration Day - Hands On Lab
workshop.description: A hands-on event to explore Oracleâ€™s API Platform and Integration Cloud Services.

labs.title: Home
labs.description: Welcome to the APIPCS and ICS workshop

labs.title: Lab 100: Simple API Development
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to develop a simple HelloWorld API using ICS. Lab will give you an overview of some of the ICS features that can be used to create API's.

labs.title: Lab 200: API Implementation
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to implement the API so that we can manage and secure the simple API created in Lab 100.

labs.title: Lab 300: API Policies
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to apply policies to govern the API we created in Lab 200.

labs.title: Lab 400: API Analytics
labs.description: In this Lab we are explore the analytics collected by the API Platform.
